hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASE_TYPE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Valid values are: auto, minor, snapshot.0, snapshot.1, edge. When "auto" is specified, the type of the release will be determined based on the current date.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BACKEND_RELEASING_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Branch of the backend to release

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: UI_RELEASING_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Branch of the UI to release

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SITE_RELEASING_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Branch of the website to release

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OPERATOR_RELEASING_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Branch of the operator to release

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BACKEND_GITHUB_URI
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: SSH Url of the kiali-backend GitHub repository

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: UI_GITHUB_URI
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: SSH Url of the kiali-ui GitHub repository

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SITE_GITHUB_URI
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: SSH Url of the kiali.io GitHub repository

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OPERATOR_GITHUB_URI
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: SSH Url of the kiali-operator GitHub repository

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: HELM_GITHUB_URI
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: SSH Url of the helm-charts GitHub repository

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: QUAY_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The name of the Quay repository to push the release

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: QUAY_OPERATOR_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The name of the Quay repository to push the operator release

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BACKEND_PULL_URI
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The URL of the GitHub API to use to create pull requests for the back-end (changes to prepare for next version)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: UI_PULL_URI
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The URL of the GitHub API to use to create pull requests for the UI (changes to prepare for next version)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SITE_PULL_URI
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The URL of the GitHub API to use to create pull requests for the UI (changes to prepare for next version)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OPERATOR_PULL_URI
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The URL of the GitHub API to use to create pull requests for the operator (changes to prepare for next version)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: HELM_PULL_URI
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The URL of the GitHub API to use to create pull requests for the helm-charts (changes to prepare for next version)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NPM_DRY_RUN
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Set to "y" if you want to make a "dry run" of the front-end release process

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SKIP_UI_RELEASE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Set to 'y' if you don't want to release the UI

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SKIP_BACKEND_RELEASE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Set to 'y' if you don't want to release the backend

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SKIP_OPERATOR_RELEASE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Set to 'y' if you don't want to release the operator

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SKIP_HELM_RELEASE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Set to 'y' if you don't want to release the helm charts

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SHOULD_RELEASE_SITE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Set to 'y' to force release of the website

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: UI_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: If you are skipping UI release. Specify the UI version to package, or leave unset to use the version present in the main Makefile (e.g. leave unset for patch releases)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NPM_CONFIG_REGISTRY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Registry to use for fetching packages. This is not used for publishing releases. Do not include the trailing slash.
